title: Deep Residual Learning for Image Recognition
authors: Kaiming He, X. Zhang, Shaoqing Ren, Jian Sun
journal: IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern...
snippet: We present a residual learning framework to ease the training of networks that are substantially deeper than those used previously.

title: Beyond a Gaussian Denoiser: Residual Learning of Deep CNN for Image Denoising
authors: K. Zhang, W. Zuo, Yunjin Chen, Deyu Meng, Lei Zhang
snippet: We investigate the construction of feed-forward denoising convolutional neural networks (DnCNNs) to embrace the progress in very deep architecture, learning algorithm, and regularization method into image Denoising.

title: Inception-v4, Inception-ResNet and the Impact of Residual Connections on Learning
authors: Christian Szegedy, S. Ioffe, V. Vanhoucke, Alexander Amir Alemi
snippet: We study the combination of the two most recent ideas: Residual connections introduced by He et al. in [5] and the latest revised version of the Inception architecture.

title: Prior-Attention Residual Learning for More Discriminative COVID-19 Screening in CT Images
authors: J. Wang, Yuyan Bao, +6 authors Dahong Qian
snippet: We propose a conceptually simple framework for fast COVID-19 screening in 3D chest CT images.

title: CREST: Convolutional Residual Learning for Visual Tracking
authors: Yibing Song, Chao Ma, Lijun Gong, Jiawei Zhang, Rynson W. H. Lau, Ming-Hsuan Yang
journal: IEEE International Conference on Computer Vision...
snippet: We reformulate DCFs as a one-layer convolutional neural network that directly generates response map as the spatial correlation between two consecutive frames.

title: Multi-Scale Deep Residual Learning-Based Single Image Haze Removal via Image Decomposition
authors: Chia-Hung Yeh, Chih-Hsiang Huang, Li-Wei Kang
snippet: A novel deep learning-based architecture (denoted by MSRL-DehazeNet) for single image haze removal relying on multi-scale residual learning (MSRL) and image decomposition is proposed.

title: Attention Residual Learning for Skin Lesion Classification
authors: J. Zhang, Y. Xie, Y. Xia, Chunhua Shen
snippet: We propose an attention residual learning convolutional neural network for skin lesion classification in dermoscopy images, which is composed of multiple ARL blocks, a global average pooling layer, and a classification layer.

title: Cascade Residual Learning: A Two-Stage Convolutional Neural Network for Stereo Matching
authors: Jiahao Pang, Wenxiu Sun, J. Ren, Chengxi Yang, Q. Yan
journal: IEEE International Conference on Computer Vision...
snippet: Leveraging on the recent developments in convolutional neural networks (CNNs), matching dense correspondence from a stereo pair has been cast as a learning problem, with performance exceeding traditional approaches.

title: Deep Residual Learning for Instrument Segmentation in Robotic Surgery
authors: D. Pakhomov, Vittal Premachandran, M. Allan, M. Azizian, Nassir Navab

title: Video Person Re-Identification by Temporal Residual Learning
authors: J. Dai, Pingping Zhang, D. Wang, H. Lu, H. Wang
snippet: In this paper, we propose a novel feature learning framework for video person re-identification (re-ID).
